item.title: Help with Item Command!
item.dc:creator: @XxD3V1NxX XxD3V1NxX
item.description:
@XxD3V1NxX wrote:

How would i make this command Admin only???
case “item”:
if (cmd.length < 2) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“Use: ::item id (optional:amount)”);
return true;
try {
int itemId = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]);
player.getInventory().addItem(itemId,
cmd.length >= 3 ? Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]) : 1);
player.stopAll();
} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“Use: ::item id (optional:amount)”);
}
return true;

Read full topic
